description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Bumper Knights is fast-paced, action-brimming, trajectory-flinging fun! Bounce your way through procedurally generated forests, villages, and castles to save the land from the forces of greed. Collect rare and powerful weapons in your favorite replayable quests. And most importantly, meet the infamously impressive band of Bumper Knights- Spring, Pierce, Appel, and Thud. Together we will win!
description.short: Bumper Knights is fast-paced, action-brimming, trajectory-flinging fun! Bounce your way through procedurally generated forests, villages, and castles to save the land from the forces of greed. Collect rare and powerful weapons in your favorite replayable quests. And most importantly, meet the infamously impressive band of Bumper Knights- Spring, Pierce, Appel, and Thud. Together we will win!
